mapper.select: SELECT FROM erp_bank_slip_claim ebsc WHERE ebsc.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ebsc.data_status = 1

SELECT count(ebsc.id) FROM erp_bank_slip_claim ebsc
AND ebsc.data_status = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE erp_bank_slip_claim ebsc SET ebsc.data_status = 2,ebsc.update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},ebsc.update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ebsc.bank_slip_detail_id = #{bankSlipDetailId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ebsc.data_status = 1
mapper.select: SELECT FROM erp_bank_slip_claim ebsc WHERE ebsc.other_side_account_no = #{otherSideAccountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ebsc.data_status = 1
SELECT SUM(ebsc.claim_amount) FROM erp_bank_slip_claim ebsc WHERE ebsc.bank_slip_detail_id = #{bankSlipDetailId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ebsc.data_status = 1
SELECT FROM erp_bank_slip_claim ebsc WHERE ebsc.bank_slip_detail_id = #{bankSlipDetailId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ebsc.create_user = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ebsc.data_status = 1
